snippet.title: Donkey Kong DX - colorization hack (first teaser trailer)
snippet.description:
Donkey Kong DX is a fanmade remastered version of the classic Game Boy Donkey Kong game, turning it into a Game Boy Color game that works in real hardware.


Graphics by kensuyjin33 & Jorge2D
Hacking by marc_max

DK Bezel used in the trailer made by OrionsAngel
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gZjaftISd44
Check out his YouTube channel - https://youtube.com/orionsangel
